basics.name: Lara Miyakawa Ho
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences and a B.A in Finance in the Department of Finance at the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2026.

highlights: Assist in the preparation and review of financial statements in accordance with GAAP and relevant regulatory standards
Perform compliance testing and analytical procedures to identify trends, variances, and potential misstatements
Support audit teams in risk assessment and internal control evaluations
Collaborate with team members to meet deadlines and ensure high-quality deliverables
Contribute to budgeting and audit planning efforts through data gathering and documentation
Prepare daily assignments, homework, and testing
Instruct and assist over 50 students in their activities
Manage employees, train new hires, and communicate with parents in absence of supervisor
Oversee and maintain an alumni database of 300+ members, ensuring up-to-date records and engagement
Plan and execute alumni-focused initiatives, including social events, newsletters, and large-scale gatherings with 70+ participants
Lead club member recruitment efforts, increasing engagement and participation through strategic outreach
Organize a Professional Interaction Night with over 80 students and professionals
Further professional growth and goals of members by organizing six tours with various corporations

awards.title: Eddie Flores, Jr. & Elaine Flores Endowed Scholarship
